channel.title: Blocking someone Logging to your server, with another client
channel.description:
This has came a big problem now, Many people use Another client, but not my friend's server's client,
is they a code in any chance? that is something to do with Matches UID? So it restricts login, But if you use the client it Allows you to logon.

item.description:
@12mil wrote:

This has came a big problem now, Many people use Another client, but not my friend’s server’s client,

is they a code in any chance? that is something to do with Matches UID?
So it restricts login, But if you use the client it Allows you to logon.
